articles.author: Noam Levey
articles.title: Republicans push high deductible plans and health savings accounts : Shots - Health News - NPR
articles.description: A Republican call to give Americans cash instead of health insurance subsidies revives an old idea that has left millions with medical debt.
articles.content:
Sarah Monroe once had a relatively comfortable middle-class life.

articles.title: Former MAGA loyalist Marjorie Taylor Greene says Trump policies are not America First - CBS News
articles.description: The relationship between Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene, one of President Trump's most loyal backers, soured over the Epstein files and disagreements over MAGA policies.
